name: Word Search Free (itch)
description:
Have you ever wanted a word search the fits your needs, a word search that you could always play without ever getting bored? Well, now you can! This word search offers lots of categories and lots of words that you can use daily. On daily basis, we always update our app with new words and also update it with newer categories every week. So you never get bored of searching for your words. Try today.

It is best to note that since this is the free version of the game, updates and newer words will not come as frequently. Although the free version will be better off if you don't like buying apps, the paid version will have plenty of bug fixes and updates to improve the overall game experience.
